short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Notepad-like extension for chrome that utilises the side panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Take notes in the side panel while scrolling the internet.
- Up to 6 notes can be saved and synced between 
  devices when signed into your Google account.
- Option to download the note as a text file.
- Can assign one of four colour themes to a note.
- Includes the basic notepad features copy, paste and 
  undo.
